Package org.apache.arrow.algorithm.sort

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    InPlaceVectorSorter<V extends ValueVector>
    Basic interface for sorting a vector in-place.
    OutOfPlaceVectorSorter<V extends ValueVector>
    Basic interface for sorting a vector out-of-place.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CompositeVectorComparator
    A composite vector comparator compares a number of vectors by a number of inner comparators.
    DefaultVectorComparators
    Default comparator implementations for different types of vectors.
    DefaultVectorComparators.ByteComparator
    Default comparator for bytes.
    DefaultVectorComparators.Float4Comparator
    Default comparator for float type.
    DefaultVectorComparators.Float8Comparator
    Default comparator for double type.
    DefaultVectorComparators.IntComparator
    Default comparator for 32-bit integers.
    DefaultVectorComparators.LongComparator
    Default comparator for long integers.
    DefaultVectorComparators.RepeatedValueComparator<T extends ValueVector>
    Default comparator for BaseRepeatedValueVector.
    DefaultVectorComparators.ShortComparator
    Default comparator for short integers.
    DefaultVectorComparators.UInt1Comparator
    Default comparator for unsigned bytes.
    DefaultVectorComparators.UInt2Comparator
    Default comparator for unsigned short integer.
    DefaultVectorComparators.UInt4Comparator
    Default comparator for unsigned integer.
    DefaultVectorComparators.UInt8Comparator
    Default comparator for unsigned long integer.
    DefaultVectorComparators.VariableWidthComparator
    Default comparator for BaseVariableWidthVector.
    FixedWidthInPlaceVectorSorter<V extends BaseFixedWidthVector>
    Default in-place sorter for fixed-width vectors.
    FixedWidthOutOfPlaceVectorSorter<V extends BaseFixedWidthVector>
    Default out-of-place sorter for fixed-width vectors.
    GeneralOutOfPlaceVectorSorter<V extends ValueVector>
    An out-of-place sorter for vectors of arbitrary type, with time complexity O(n*log(n)).
    IndexSorter<V extends ValueVector>
    Sorter for the indices of a vector.
    StableVectorComparator<V extends ValueVector>
    Stable sorter.
    VariableWidthOutOfPlaceVectorSorter<V extends BaseVariableWidthVector>
    Default sorter for variable-width vectors.
    VectorValueComparator<V extends ValueVector>
    Compare two values at the given indices in the vectors.
